alert.note: Alert for Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 3:20PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MEADE COUNTY THROUGH 400 PM MDT... At 319 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Piedmont, or 11 miles southeast of Sturgis, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Ellsworth Air Force Base, Summerset, Piedmont, and Tilford. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 38 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
